item.title: Windows 11 24H2 and 25H2 get new camera settings, File Explorer fixes and more in new builds
item.description: Microsoft has released new Release Preview builds for Windows 11 insiders, previewing what is to come later this month as the latest non-security update. ...

item.title: Here is how Microsoft is improving PowerShell and Windows OpenSSH in 2026
item.description: Microsoft is gearing up for big PowerShell and Windows OpenSSH changes in 2026, but security will come before flashy new features. ...

item.title: Copilot quietly pulls your data from other Microsoft products, including Edge and MSN, but you can opt out
item.description: Microsoft Copilot automatically pulls your data from other Microsoft products, such as Bing, MSN, and Edge.

item.title: Hackers target Microsoft Entra accounts in device code vishing attacks
item.description: Threat actors are targeting technology, manufacturing, and financial organizations in campaigns that combine device code phishing and voice phishing (vishing) to abuse the OAuth 2.0 Device Authorization flow and compromise Microsoft Entra accounts. [...]

item.title: Project Silica : Microsoft grave 4,8 téraoctets sur du verre pour 10 000 ans
item.description: Face à l'explosion des données numériques et à la dégradation rapide des supports actuels, Microsoft présente une avancée majeure dans le stockage sur verre, promettant de conserver notre héritage numérique pour des millénaires.

item.title: Microsoft Edge for Business adds direct Copilot integration for Office documents and YouTube
item.description: Stop scrolling. Copilot in Edge now summarizes your open tabs, M365 files, and videos instantly, but check your security settings first. ...

item.title: Microsoft shows off AI running on the Windows 11 taskbar and File Explorer
item.description: Microsoft just showed off "agents" on the taskbar via "Ask Copilot," which is an optional feature that replaces Windows Search.

item.title: Hands on with Windows 11 26H1 and why this update is not meant for your PC
item.description: Microsoft’s Windows 11 26H1 sounds like the next big update, but it is actually a specialized release built for new ARM devices like Snapdragon X2 PCs. Our hands-on testing shows almost no visible changes, because this version focuses on a new platform core designed for future silicon only and nothing for existing PCs

item.title: Microsoft splits Canary Channel into two with new Windows 11 build 29531.1000
item.description: Microsoft is rolling out Windows 11 build 29531.1000, making the Canary Channel and the entire Windows Insider program even more confusing. ...

item.title: Critical infra Honeywell CCTVs vulnerable to auth bypass flaw
item.description: The U.S. Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA) is warning of a critical vulnerability in multiple Honeywell CCTV products that allows unauthorized access to feeds or account hijacking. [...]

item.title: AI platforms can be abused for stealthy malware communication
item.description: AI assistants like Grok and Microsoft Copilot with web browsing and URL-fetching capabilities can be abused to intermediate command-and-control (C2) activity. [...]

item.title: Microsoft 365 Copilot for Android or iOS auto-sends files to AI & OneDrive before you even realise it, instead of opening normally
item.description: Microsoft 365 Copilot for Android or iOS now sends everything to Copilot. Worse, it auto-uploads files to OneDrive.

item.title: Microsoft: Anti-phishing rules mistakenly blocked emails, Teams messages
item.description: Microsoft says an Exchange Online issue that mistakenly quarantined legitimate emails last week was triggered by faulty heuristic detection rules designed to block credential phishing campaigns. [...]

item.title: Microsoft says bug causes Copilot to summarize confidential emails
item.description: Microsoft says a Microsoft 365 Copilot bug has been causing the AI assistant to summarize confidential emails since late January, bypassing data loss prevention (DLP) policies that organizations rely on to protect sensitive information. [...]

item.title: Windows 11 Beta build 26220.7859 arrives with a new Microsoft 365 upgrade prompt in Settings
item.description: Windows 11 Insider Preview Build 26220.7859 (KB5077223) arrives in the Beta Channel with minor improvements and bug fixes. ...

item.title: Edge 145 is out with improved password manager, smarter Read Aloud, and a lot more
item.description: Microsoft Edge 145 is here, now available for everyone, with a massive changelog and some useful feature updates. ...

item.title: Microsoft details Windows 11 26H1 support cycle, CPU requirements (just Snapdragon X2 for now), and more
item.description: Microsoft says Windows 11 26H1 is supported until March 2028 for consumers and is now rolling out on PCs with eligible CPUs.

item.title: Microsoft announces powerful tool for security teams using Defender
item.description: Microsoft just gave Defender a powerful new upgrade that could transform how security teams hunt and respond to threats. ...

item.title: Chinese hackers exploiting Dell zero-day flaw since mid-2024
item.description: A suspected Chinese state-backed hacking group has been quietly exploiting a critical Dell security flaw in zero-day attacks that started in mid-2024. [...]

item.title: Lecornu en équilibre entre soutien aux solutions de la DINUM et recours à la French tech
item.description: Le Premier ministre a publié une circulaire « relative à la commande publique numérique » couchant noir sur blanc la doctrine de l’État concernant les choix et achats de logiciels par ses services. Elle priorise l’utilisation de solutions internes existantes avant l’achat de produits « sur étagère ». Le développement de solutions en interne n’arrive qu’après. Depuis […]

item.title: Microsoft says Windows 11 update causes BSOD on some GPU config, broke WPA3 Wi‑Fi, but a fix is rolling out
item.description: Microsoft says it is aware of two separate issues that could affect some Windows 11 installs, including a fatal bug that crashes PCs.

item.title: Microsoft pushes back “switch to MacBook” for a compact adapter, says Surface has slim chargers too in a viral X post
item.description: A viral post comparing a MacBook charger to an old Windows brick sparked backlash, but the comparison ignored how most modern Windows laptops already use compact USB-C adapters.

item.title: Windows 11 may finally let you move and resize the taskbar in 2026 as Microsoft responds to user feedback
item.description: Microsoft is reportedly preparing to restore one of the most requested features in Windows 11 the ability to move the taskbar to the top or sides of the screen. Alongside this change, the company is also working on taskbar resizing. The update is expected as part of Microsoft’s broader 2026 improvements.

item.title: Microsoft begins pushing Microsoft 365 Copilot on macOS if you use fresh installs of Microsoft 365 suite enterprise
item.description: Microsoft is moving ahead with its plans to push Microsoft 365 Copilot to more customers on macOS, mostly enterprises.

item.title: Nigerian man gets eight years in prison for hacking tax firms
item.description: A Nigerian national was sentenced to eight years in prison for hacking multiple tax preparation firms in Massachusetts and filing fraudulent tax returns seeking over $8.1 million in refunds. [...]

item.title: L'application Xbox compte résumer vos meilleures sessions de jeu sur PC
item.description: Avec l'application Xbox pour PC, Microsoft teste une fonctionnalité Postgame Recaps. Des récapitulatifs automatiques mettent en avant les moments forts d'une session de jeu. En espérant que les ressources de l'ordinateur n'en pâtissent pas.

item.title: Texas sues TP-Link over Chinese hacking risks, user deception
item.description: Texas sued networking giant TP-Link Systems, accusing the company of deceptively marketing its routers as secure while allowing Chinese state-backed hackers to exploit firmware vulnerabilities and access users' devices. [...]

item.title: Police arrests 651 suspects in African cybercrime crackdown
item.description: African authorities arrested 651 suspects and recovered over $4.3 million in a joint operation targeting investment fraud, mobile money scams, and fake loan applications. [...]

item.title: L'avertissement de Microsoft : les subventions chinoises faussent la course à l'IA
item.description: Brad Smith, le président de Microsoft, a publiquement exprimé une inquiétude que beaucoup partageaient en privé : la compétition avec la Chine en matière d'IA n'est plus sur un pied d'égalité.

item.title: New 'Massiv' Android banking malware poses as an IPTV app
item.description: A newly identified Android banking trojan named Massiv has been under active distribution across south Europe, disguised as an IPTV app. [...]

item.title: Microsoft Teams web users get new consolidated device settings hub
item.description: Microsoft is overhauling Teams web settings this month. Update your manuals now to avoid support issues with the new audio and video hub. ...

item.title: Un bug dans Microsoft 365 Copilot lui permettait de résumer des emails confidentiels
item.description: L’assistant IA inclus dans Microsoft 365 Copilot avait la possibilité de passer outre les mesures de sécurités censées être mises en place pour qu’il n’accède pas à tous les contenus des utilisateurs de la suite. BleepingComputer a relevé que Microsoft avait signalé depuis le 21 janvier ce bug dans son outil réservé aux administrateurs Microsoft […]

item.title: Microsoft's new Teams ‘nag screen' will force you to choose a browser
item.description: Teams is rolling out a new browser selector, but it comes with a catch: prompts to install Edge. Here is how to manage it. ...

item.title: Microsoft is uploading your confidential emails to Copilot for summarization
item.description: Copilot caught peeking? A bug reportedly let the AI read confidential enterprise emails it was never meant to see. A complete fix is still not available. ...

item.title: Microsoft testing Postgame Recaps feature on PC to highlight your gaming sessions
item.description: Microsoft wants to give you highlights from your PC gaming sessions using the new Postgame Recaps feature. ...

item.title: Telegram channels expose rapid weaponization of SmarterMail flaws
item.description: Underground Telegram channels shared SmarterMail exploit PoCs and stolen admin credentials within days of disclosure. Flare explains how monitoring these communities reveals rapid weaponization of CVE-2026-24423 and CVE-2026-23760 tied to ransomware activity. [...]

item.title: Bethesda updates Skyrim on Switch 2 with 60 FPS mode and much-needed fixes
item.description: Following The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim's Switch 2 port backlash, Bethesda has finally delivered major fixes to the game. ...

item.title: Data breach at fintech firm Figure affects nearly 1 million accounts
item.description: Hackers have stolen the personal and contact information of nearly 1 million accounts after breaching the systems of Figure Technology Solutions, a self-described blockchain-native financial technology company. [...]

item.title: Glendale man gets 5 years in prison for role in darknet drug ring
item.description: ​A Glendale man was sentenced to nearly five years in federal prison for his role in a darknet drug trafficking operation that sold cocaine, methamphetamine, MDMA, and ketamine to customers across the United States. [...]

item.title: Windows 11 finally supports MIDI 2.0
item.description: Windows 11 finally gets serious about music, native MIDI 2.0 support is here with the big upgrades musicians wanted. ...

item.title: Spain orders NordVPN, ProtonVPN to block LaLiga piracy sites
item.description: A Spanish court has granted precautionary measures against NordVPN and ProtonVPN, ordering the two popular VPN providers to block 16 websites that facilitate piracy of football matches. [...]

item.title: AMD releases new chipset drivers with Windows 11 25H2 support and more
item.description: AMD has a new chipset driver for supported platforms with bugfixes, Windows 11 25H2 support, and more. ...

item.title: Flaws in popular VSCode extensions expose developers to attacks
item.description: Vulnerabilities with high to critical severity ratings affecting popular Visual Studio Code (VSCode) extensions collectively downloaded more than 128 million times could be exploited to steal local files and execute code remotely. [...]

item.title: Mozilla is ending Firefox support on Windows 7
item.description: Time to say goodbye: Firefox 115 ESR, the last mainstream browser to still update itself on Windows 7, is on its way out this month. ...

item.title: Windows 11 just got a major 5G boost thanks to Ericsson
item.description: Ericsson returns with a silent 5G upgrade for Windows 11 that keeps enterprise users always connected without the hassle. ...

item.title: Save 60% on Microsoft Office 2024 Home & Business for Mac or PC
item.description: One-time purchase of classic 2024 desktop versions of Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and OneNote. limited time deal. ...

item.title: Windows 11 KB5077181 fixes gaming bugs, Nvidia black screen, and performance issue affecting explorer.exe, taskbar, and Start menu
item.description: KB5077181 could make some PCs faster if explorer.exe was hanging on your system, and it also fixes the black screen issue on Nvidia GPUs.
